text: Easter Weekend in Princeton: Bunnies, Egg Hunts, and Some Serious Spirituality Princeton, NJ – It’s Easter weekend – a time when some of our readers may consider touching base with a house of worship or an event that celebrates … [TAPintoLocal](/@TAPintoLocal) flipped this story into [TAPinto](/@tapintolocal/tapinto-hf1i4pkgz)•49m More stories from [Princeton (N.J.)](/topic/princetonnewjersey) More stories from [Princeton University](/topic/princetonuniversity) [Norman Finkelstein on Israel’s ‘final solution’ in Gaza](/topic/princetonuniversity/norman-finkelstein-on-israel-s-final-solution-in-gaza/a-Ufsnp84ZTHegjwWli8O1ew%3Aa%3A3662058399-9876087c21%2Ftherealnews.com) Norman Finkelstein and Chris Hedges appeared together at Princeton University on March 21 for “On the Gaza Genocide,” where they discussed the events … [I was just accepted into Princeton University after the repeal of affirmative action. As a person of color, I'm feeling conflicted.](/topic/princetonuniversity/i-was-just-accepted-into-princeton-university-after-the-repeal-of-affirmative-ac/a-d8IFYSL-R6-T7azufxHPZw%3Aa%3A2917548760-8ea7e5b47d%2Fbusinessinsider.in) The college admissions process is a game. Unlike other games, though, you don't necessarily have the chance to fail, to practice, to test-drive, or … [Princeton grad, LGBTQ activist who led queer alumni charged with possession of child porn](/topic/princetonuniversity/princeton-grad-lgbtq-activist-who-led-queer-alumni-charged-with-possession-of-c/a-0InCTPo4Srm-_p8yEz3uEw%3Aa%3A47769551-4121afb8ce%2Ffoxnews.com) An LGBTQ activist who led Princeton University's Queer Alumni Club, and also held degrees from Yale and Harvard, has been accused of downloading child pornography.
